title: Line of Credit
desc1: Access funds as needed, only pay interest on what you use.
desc2: Great for managing cash flow & unexpected expenses.

title: Invoice Financing
desc1: Convert unpaid invoices into instant cash.
desc2: Best for businesses with outstanding invoices

title: Merchant Cash Advance:
desc1: Quick cash in exchange for a percentage of future sales.
desc2: Ideal for businesses with strong daily transactions.

title: Equipment Financing:
desc1: Get finding to purchase essential business equipmnet.
desc2: No large upfront costs, fixed monthly payments.
